1.content:
You emerge from the rubble of your crashed ship, a few moments ago, you ran out of fuel, and the emergency signal went off in the ship, your team frantically panicking that the ship was being pulled into a planet. You removed your helmet, because clearly this planet had oxygen, it was lush with dense forests, large oceans and plains. Rubbing the dust off of your head, you got up to your feet and began to walk around. The gravity on the planet was close to earths, and you could see this planet was less advanced in evolution, because it looked like a prehistoric earth.

The temperature was high, almost 90 degrees, you took off your space suit and ordered the rest of the surviving crew to do the same. It was time to look for shelter. You called your crew to come with you.

Your first destination?
1.title: Crashsite

choices: The berry bush begins to move
11.content:
Thinking quickly you saw the forests, there you could use the shade from the trees and warmth of the forest for comfort and shelter to avoid the planets harsh sun.

After a few miles of walking you and the crew reach the edge of the forest.
"Alright men" said one of the commanders
"Let's split up and look for shelter and food and we will meet up in 10 hours with what we found"
"Sir!" responded the rest of the team
You and another crew member, a woman named Sinthia went out to the west side of the forest.
She tagged close behind, holding her G18 close just in case the need of firearms. Finding a small patch of berries, Sinthia immediately runs up to them, you and the rest of the crew including Sinthia haven't eaten in days. She grabbed a handful of berries, shoving them into her mouth, and swallowed the whole bunch whole without trying to test them first. She waited a few moments, and looked at you, with your face of surprise, "You are lucky those aren't poison Sinthia, I wouldn't be able to help you."
"Don't worry I've got a cast iron stomach" she said, and gave her belly a small pat. Her belly began to rumble, getting louder and louder every second, you where scared that the berries might make her explode! After a loud gurgle her stomach calmed down, "Cast Iron" she said with a wink.
11.title: The lush green forests

choices: You make a run for it
111.content:
Suddenly as if Sinthia was to grab another bunch of berries from the bush, the ground began to rumble, and create small fissures that seemed to lead to the center of the earth. But no, they had a bottom, rumbling to the surface was a massive head, next came a neck, body, with two plump breasts that as they arose they cracked the earth even further as they squeezed out of the ground, and then its body. The creature stopped coming from the ground, already at a massive 35 feet. Suddenly the creature swept the green colored hair from its eyes, it had the face of a beautiful 25 year old woman, with deep green eyes, the same color as her hair.

The creature began to look around and spotted the two of you stunned on the ground. She smiled, "Hello why are you two so small? You must not be from this world."
"Y-You can speak english?" you said.
"Of course, we all can!"
"What do you mean we?" you asked.
"This whole planet is filled with creatures like me, now lets cut to the chase, why are you in my domain of the forest?"
Trembling you did not know what to say, terrified you where on a planet of giants.
111.title: The living tree

1111.content:
Seeing this giant half tree was not going to let you go, you grabbed Sinthia's arm and made a run for it,
"Damn It!" yelled the giantess and she tried to grab you. Moving quickly you swiftly avoided her grabs and ran through a clearing in the trees.
As you ran through the dense forest you realized Sinthia's grip was lost, you looked back and she was not there. You could not trace your steps but you did smell the strong scent of her cologne that she put on if ever so the need.

Following the strong scent you came to a small circular clearing in the woods, looking around the circle you saw a large plant in the middle. You then realized that you had crossed this clearing before, and that Sinthia was not wandering off but she got trapped somehow. Suddenly to your amazement, the plant moved something popped out from the bud on the top, the plant was expanding in size, until it was about 15 feet tall. Then a face emerged from the top of the plant, the bud split and out emerged the upper body of a beautiful girl. She looked much like the tree girl you saw before but much smaller. She did have green hair and green eyes just like the tree girl, but her hair was much shorter, cut just about to shoulder length. She looked over to you licking her lips, purple sylive began to drool down them. Suddenly she pulled another bud our from under her rooted down body, the bud opened up and there was Sinthia.
1111.title: From bad to worse

11111.content:
The girl licked her salivating lips again, "My name is Alya, honey, whats yours?"
You where still stunned to see that this half plant half girl had our partner in her grasp.
"N-Nathan" you replied

"Whats wrong honey? I'm not going to hurt you, yet"
"W-What d-do you mean yet?" you said
"Not until I finish digesting your partner, I can't have two ccupants in my belly, you will just have to wait an hour before I can eat you."
"But I don't want to be eaten!" you yelled
"Well to bad, anything that stumbles into my part of the forest, I will eat them, those are the rules."
Before you could say anything you where trapped in a vine from the ground and brought close to your captor.
"Now watch closely as I devour your friend so you may see how you are going to die."

The plant girl expanded her mouth, like a rubber band and inserted Sinthia's head, slowly working along she sucked in her upper torso.
Alya was pleasured by this greatly as she moaned and groaned. You could hear the slurping very loudly. Sinthia's whole upper body was inside Alya's throat and she was now working on swallowing her legs. A bulge began to appear in Alya's belly, as she swallowed down Sinthia's legs. With one final gulp Sinthia was gone, A large bulge streched out Alya's belly, she patted it as it began digestion on its meal. Sinthia went lower into the ground, so that her plant half was burrowed down into the ground, her belly tightly stuck unable to fit into the whole. "I guess I'll have to wait out here instead of inside my hole. But this is better so that I can let you listen to your partner digest." You began to sob as she brought the vines that where carrying you to her arms. She took you out of the vines, into her grasp. With a strong push she put you onto her belly, holding onto you with the assistance of the vines.

You struggled hard, but it was no use it was impossible to break out of Alya's grasp.
11111.title: The giant trap

111111.content:
"Now sit back and listen, like a good boy."
Alya, began to salivate the purple acid again, licking her lips over and over, rubbing her stomach slowly while moaning.

She then began to emit a strange odor, that made you feel sleepy and pleasured with ecstasy.
Calming you down, you sunk your head down into Alya's stomach, you could hear the gurgles and growls of the digestion process taking place. She began to stroke you, "Don't worry it will all be over soon"

And at that you fell asleep, due to suffocation of the hard grip and the odor.

After a while Alya's belly began to shrink, which woke you up. She stopped emitting the odor, so your ecstasy was gone. You began to struggle again as you heard the digestion process on Sinthia coming too an end.

"Oh excuse me honey" said Alya.
She then lifted you off her stomach and the vines held you a few feet away.
In pure terror you saw a large lump ascending Alya's throat, she began to cough and gargle and then a large dark purple mass slithered from her mouth onto the ground. As it landed you knew full well this was Sinthia's discarded body.

"What are you looking at?" she said.

You shrugged.
"Well no matter honey, its your turn to be my food."
111111.title: Digestion of Sinthia

1111112.content:
Your time had come, from a polluted earth to an acidic plant girl belly, they weren't much different.

Alya opened her humongous mouth, like she had before, putting you in head first, you saw what Sinthia would have if she was awake, Alya's insides where purple, and her acidic saliva dripped down in ribbons in her cavernous mouth. You heard loud slurps coming from her throat, which you where looking straight down, as Alya pulled your upper body in all together. Your head was now in her throat, which was a very tight squeeze, it was coated with acid that burned at your skin every inch you squeezed down. Your legs where the only things free and kicking, but Alya held them tight with her arms as she slurped in the rest of you down her gullet. Your head now entered the inside of Alya's stomach, which smelled like the calming odor she used on you before. At last Alya slurped in your feet, which where in her mouth while your body was heading down her throat, clothes and all. As you where further pushed in, your face was dunked, into the acidic liquids in her belly, you could do nothing about it because your arms where still in her throat. She gulped down your legs, and now you started slip down further into the stomach. The last two things to enter where your legs which plopped straight down. The acid was torture to your skin, boiling and stinging, but the pain was aided by the odor of her stomach.
"I'm sorry honey, but I'm bigger than you, and those are the rules of the forest, that I must eat to live."

On the outside Alya laid back, with one hand behind her head and another stroking her stomach.
"Don't worry it will all be over soon" she said, while rubbing her stomach harder and moaning.
Your kicking was no use, her stomach was too stretchy and she was to relaxed and sleepy to let you out of her stomach. This continued for another 20 minutes until your skin began to flake, becoming hard leathery pieces. It began to break off and drip into the acid, where it was disintigrated immediately.

You where numb, the pain was gone, but your body could take no more, it gave in. Her stomach had won and you had lost. You where her prey, your only use was nourishment to her body.

In about an hour Alya woke up from her slumber, regurgitating what was left of you next to the waste that used to be Sinthia. She then stroked her belly lightly and returned inside her hole, where she could sleep in peace, that is until the next victim comes.
1111112.title: The rules of the forest

choices: You avoid her grasp and run off into the forest
The giant woman grabs you, time for seconds
1112.content: You and Sinthia exchanged glances but neither of you really knew what to say to the giant alien tree woman. After several seconds of silence the tree woman shrugged and continued speaking "I guess it doesn't matter, it's been a bit since someone small enough came through here and I'm starving." Before you could process what she'd said the tree woman had plucked Sinthia off of the ground, Sinthia struggled against the alien's grip but when the tree woman used both hands she was able to pin Sinthia's hands to her sides and she brought Sinthia to her mouth like a sandwich. You watched in horrified fascination as the alien woman opened her maw and stuffed your screaming crewmate in headfirst, but she didn't bite or chew, she just kept pushing Sinthia further into her mouth and swallowing. You watched the squirming bulge that was Synthia as it progressed down the tree alien's throat and into her massive stomach. As the giant plant woman sighed in contentment you were transfixed, staring at the bulges you could see in her stomach from Sinthia's struggling. Then the alien opened her eyes and smiled at you, you realized that you should've been running this whole time instead of watching and so you were only just turning to flee as the alien reached out to grab you...
1112.title: Miss Tree is very hungry

choices: You and Sinthia change your minds and go look for another source of food.
112.content:
Suddenly, Sinthia's stomach started to growl again.

"Ohhhh...I'm still very hungry."

"Hey look! An apple tree! We can climb it and get apples for us to eat! I guess you don't need to worry about your hunger anymore."

"Sweet! What are we waiting for? Let's get them!"

"Easy. We don't know what kind of creatures live in this planet, so we should be care-"

But before you could finish, Sinthia cuts you.

"Oh, c'mon! Don't be such a chicken! What could go wrong?"

You tried to stop her but she was already running towards the tree.

What you didn't knew, is that something was watching you.
112.title: Sinthia gets even hungrier

1121.content:
You and Sinthia were almost reaching the tree when, suddenly, something jumped/fell of the tree and landed right in front of you.

"My, my, my. What do we have here?", said the creature.

The creature was a...
1121.title: The creature reveals itself.

11211.content: What size was the Naga?
11211.title: Naga.

11212.content:
Was it a Venus Fly Trap girl?

or

Was it a different kind of carnivorous plant girl?

11213222.content: Is it really a Giant Bee-Girl?
11213222.title: Giant Bee Girl.

choices: There appears to be something in the trees above the crew..
Nothing get to the cave safely..
Get to the caves but notice someone is missing..
You hear a scream to the south..
12.content:
The crew stood together as they watched their ship burn. Everyone was sweating from the fire but also the high temperature. Nathan knowing much about survival thought the best action was finding shelter from the heat. "Alright I know that things are bad, but we now need to focus on surviving here people. We need to find a place as a temporary shelter and get out of this heat" Nathan shouts.
Stevenson who is a friend to Nathan came out from the limping from the south. "Hey there is a set of caves over there, I landed there from the crash and harmed my leg" grunted Stevenson. Nathan declares" Alright grab anything of importance around you and head to the caves we will return when the fire dies down.

As you head to the cave...
12.title: The dark caves

choices: to send some people in to see if Stevenson could be helped
to just stay here ,and be careful not to lose anyone else
you were interrupted as the same thing that took Stevension came back for more
124.content:
The crew quickly gathers what they can get safely from the crash site and hauls it to the caves for shelter, although once you all arrive you see that it goes much deeper. After a quick discussion it's decided that for safety the crew should stick together and stay near the entrance of the caves, they provided shelter and you didn't need to risk spelunking on an alien planet. After you all get things sorted you've salvaged enough food and water to last at least three days plus some sleeping rolls and flares for lighting so you could hopefully wait until the ship cools down, salvage the wreckage, and then get some kind of distress signal rigged up. Just as you'd all gotten sorted Nathan piped up with "Has anyone seen Stevenson?" After a quick headcount the you confirmed that Stevenson was, indeed gone. Quickly the group began searching, you were the one who found the tracks. Calling everyone else's attention to what you'd found, it looked like someone, Stevenson, had been dragged deeper into the caves. The fact that something had dragged off a member of the group started a panic but you were able to get things under control soon enough. After some discussion the group decided...

interrupted
124.title: Get to the caves but notice someone is missing..

choices: a giant spider girl, she held a Sinthia sized cocoon of webbing in one hand
a cave naga, you could see Sinthia held in her hand
1241.content:
Welp, after some quick discussion Nathan Volunteered to go looking for his friend while you and another crewmember named Sinthia were voluntold to go with him. While the rest of the group kept watch over the camp the three of you crept deeper into the caves, Nathan went first with a lit signal flare followed by Sinthia and yourself. The three of you ventured into the caves, with the harsh red lighting of the flare as your only light source, you were nervous about getting lost in the cave as you saw more and more branching paths into a whole underground network but Nathan was confident he'd be able to find the way back out. Most of the time the tunnels were about 40 feet across but sometimes they'd be so big that you couldn't see the other side. After what felt like an eternity of walking through the dark you realized you hadn't been watching the tracks, looking around... there were no tracks. "Hey, Nathan, where are you leading?"
"What?" Nathan responded as he turned around. "Oh, I, well, when I lost track of the tracks I just figured we'd keep going deeper." It took all your willpower to not just facepalm upon hearing his excuse, you looked over to talk to Sinthia and then realized she wasn't there. Whipping your head around you saw movement on the edge of the light from the flare, the face of a young woman emerged from the dark, after a second you realized that from her size she must be something like 50 feet tall. Then she moved further into the light and you saw she was..
1241.title: to send some people in to see if Stevenson coul...

choices: You and the team want to explore the shores
You and the team build a raft and search the ocean
13.content:
"Look sir, theres a beach! You yelled
"Good sight Ether," said the captain. "Lets move!
South of the crashsite, about 30 meters was a large drop off, much like a slide, but more rocky and bumpy, leading directly to the shore.

Luckily the team had brought rappels with them to aid in getting down. After about 20 minutes the teams feet where planted safely on the sands of the beach.

As you and the tam hiked down the shores, you finally reached the wet sand, where the low tide ocean waves hit. Kneeling down, taking a sip of the water you realized it was fresh, not salty, this planet had freshwater oceans.

"Its safe to drink," you said.
The team began slurping up their fill, even Sinthia, one of the women on the team gulped down so much her belly stretched out, and almost popped the buttons of her shirt. Wiping her mouth triumphantly, she patted her belly, which made loud gargling and splashing sounds as her hand touched it.
13.title: The beach

choices: You want to explore a nearby shore, to the west
131.content:
"Maybe exploring the shores is a good idea" you said to the captain.
He nodded, "Yes but we should send a team out to find some fish." I will lead that expedition, while you can take some men to survay the shores.

As the captain and 10 other men sailed away on the raft, you, Sinthia and 5 other explorers began to walk around the shores.

The sand on the shores was very fine, compared to the black sand back home on earth, when you stepped on it, it would burn your feet. As you and the team began to explore the shores, Sinthia's belly rumbled, "I knew that water was no good!" you said.

"No Nathan, my belly is just hungry for food," and she began to caress it. Sinthia was always an eater, she loved food, but she was still thin because her metabolism was at an extreme high. She was about the age of 23, and she became an astronaut at 19, when you flew to the new planet. She has light brown hair, and light blue eyes, a nice tight ass and C cup breasts. You always admired her for her beauty, but the thing that was a turn off was her appetite. Before she joined up, she was a voreaphillia pornography actor, swallowing things whole for the enjoyment of vore lovers. After she quit her belly was used to being stuffed full of living things and un-chewed food.
131.title: The shores

1311.content:
The shores to the west looked promising, the sunlight shone strongly over there, so many fruits and trees grew, it also looked like a nice place to live.

After an hour of hiking you finally reached the western shore, that went around the tip of the ocean. As you continued inland, to the dense forest area for some food and shelter, you heard a loud rumbling sound. It sounded like a stomach grumbling, you looked at SInthia, she shrugged "It wasn't my tummy," she said.

Suddenly the ground began to rumble, and something giant began to rise out of the sand. It blocked out the sun as it came to form. As it wiped the blue hair from its eyes, the whole crew shrieked in fear, and in pleasure, because behind the hair of what was thought to be a monster was the face of a very attractive giant blue eyed girl.
Her head, was sticking out of the sand now, and she eyeballed the small specimens in front of her with curiosity.
"How cute, little aliens!" she yelled.
You screamed yourself seeing that this giant girl knew English in the first place.
"Why are you on this planet you little cuties!" she said.
"W-we crash landed here and came to your beach for a place to stay" you said.
"Oh, I have a place for you to stay!" she said in excitement.
"Really where?" said one of the crew members.
She lifted her arm from the sand and pointed at where you and the crew were standing.
"Here" she said with a smile.
"There's nothing here" said the same man.
"Sure there is!"
Suddenly she began to rise, and you saw the size that she actually was, about 70 feet or so, as she took her full body out of the sand. Below her belly area was a giant fish tail.
"Your a mermaid!" you said.
"Yep, I am and one of the biggest, and now for your living accomidations."
She lifted up one of the crew members, the one that asked were the crew would stay.
"Do you want to know where you will be living?" she asked.
"Y-yes m-mam." he said.
She licked her lips, salivating, she lifted him above her mouth, and opened wide, dropping him down into infinite blackness and swallowing him whole. You and the crew watched in terror while Sinthia rubbed her pussy, pleasured by what she saw. You saw the lump heading down the expanse of this giant mermaids throat kicking and screaming. With a second swallow he was gone, into her beky. Below your feet you felt his kicks, and heard his screams, and the gurgling of the mermaids stomach digesting him.
1311.title: Mermaids hide where??

choices: She makes you listen to them digest
She makes you clean her mouth
13111.content:
She began to look at the rest of the occupants on her belly, her stomach rumbled loudly, still hungry.
"You all are just so cute! I could just eat you all up!" she said with a sly smile on her face.
She began to bring handful and handful up to her mouth, swallowing at least two in one gulp. As all of the occupants slid down her throat you saw their arms and legs flailing to no avail. After a few minutes of the mermaids pleasure in her meal, and her belly settling down a bit, she prepared to swallow the remaining two humans on her stomach, who were about to be in her stomach.

As she brought you and Sinthia to your dooms, you had to ask her something first, "Why don't you live in the water, you are a mermaid!"

"Hehe, silly snack, I am a large green tail, I hunt for my food on land as well as water, but I am getting a bit lazy for sitting in the sand all day instead of actually looking for my prey."

"But please! Don't eat us!" you screamed
"Yes, eat us!" yelled Sinthia
"SHUTUP!" you yelled.

The giant mermaid looked back and forth, seeing Sinthia was pleasured by the fact of being swallowed, she put her mouth over her, and closed about half way up, so her legs were sticking out. She slurped Sinthia in while she cheered, and swallowed her down, you could see Sinthia sliding down her throat with a smile on her face. She got what she wanted.

Her stomach emitted a small rumble, signaling that Sinthia had entered and her belly was full.
"I am getting full, so I won't eat you now, but I may change my mind later, so stay on my good side and you might make it after I shit these guys out" she said.

"Now if I'm not going to swallow you, I am going to keep you as a pet sweetie, so you do whatever I say."

You nodded slowly.
13111.title: Down to her belly they go

choices: She is in a playful mood
She wants to introduce you to her friends.
131112.content:
"Mmmm, I think I have some clothes stuck in my teeth, would you be a sweetie and take the out for me?"
You would be stupid to take this offer but then again you were going to be eaten sooner or later.
"Please!!?" she said while squeezing her large breasts together, shaking them your face.
You sighed and nodded
"Yay!" she said while she lifted you up and let you into her mouth. Almost instantly she shut her mouth closed, and you were unable to see a thing. You just remembered that you did have a flashlight on you so you took it out, and viewed the inside of her mouth. Giant ribbons of saliva dripped down from her tongue to the roof of her mouth, you could hear her breathing rather loudly. The thing that caught your eye was her giant throat, where her uvula hung. You could just imagine the horror of the people you just witnessed being swallowed as they slipped down her throat into her stomach.

As you began to lift the clothes off her teeth, you could hear the screams of the humans in her stomach, as it growled loudly, bouncing off every corner in her mouth.

Suddenly you began to see her uvula retracting, which meant something was coming up.
BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRPPPP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

The force of the gas shot you out of her mouth and you landed on her hand again. "Hehe! excuse me, my belly must be too full!"

You tossed the clothes aside.
"Thank you honey"
"Now what do I do with you? she said with a grin.
131112.title: She makes you clean her mouth

info.brief_description: You and a party of astronauts find a strange planet
info.description:
You are an astronaut named Nathan Ether, with a party of astronauts you leave the crowded earth on a ship. You travel for many years until your rocket runs out of fuels, your ship crash lands on a distant planet. The planets surface, much like a prehistoric earth. As you look over a cliff you see hundreds of giant creatures, half woman half animal, on the bottom half.

Welcome to my new story, please read, review and add as much as you want here are some rules though.

-No male halvies
-No giant males
-Scat is ok, but please don't go too far in detail that people with a weak stomach will puke
-The animal parts, or plant parts can only be on the bottom halves, unless you want to make a cat girl with animal ears.
-Plain giantesses are alright too, but I mainly want to focus on halvies.
-There are parts of the planet were the creatures live, like dont talk about a mermaid living in the desert.
-Nathan CAN! die but please make it descriptive of the way he dies
-Please, like most of my stories feel free to add anything you wish, but keep in mind i will be reading all of your chapters.

Environments

Forest:

Venus Fly trap girl- Larger than human about 15 feet tall, can enlarge mouth wide and swallow things as large as itself whole. Its digestive tract is strong and acids are deadly, it will completely digest everything in its belly in one hour.

Blob girls: 20 feet tall about, blob-like transparent lower body, but cute girl upper body until the waste, doesn't have to use its mouth to swallow but normally does, she can absorb you into her bottom half or swallow you through her mouth into her regular stomach. Blob-part is mainly digestive juices.

Nagas: Girl upper body until waste and snake lower body, it has a tendency to hunt climbing on trees but nobody really lived to long to study their hunting habits. Nagas are one of the largest species in the forest, at about 65-70 feet tall, they normally swallow prey whole and alive and like to feel them squirming around in their bellies

Tree girls: Half girl half tree on the bottom, they slurp on any tree dwelling animals or anything that is dumb enough to walk straight into her mouth, immoble like the venus fly trap girl, it is usually lazy so it has a slow digestive tract. The only mobile part of this creature is its upper body down to the waste. Tree girls can also burrow under the ground and disguise as bushes.
________________________________________________________________________

The dark caves:

Spider girls: Half spider, half woman, has and 8 legged thorax and woman's upper body. They usually hide underground, in funnel tubes waiting for unsuspecting prey to slip in. They are usually 40 to 50 feet tall, and will either swallow prey whole or turn them into a liquid with acid from their mouths and drink them. They also make giant webs in the back of caves.

Cave Nagas: A smaller naga, the same size as spider girls that usually wait under rocks and live in wholes, they usually sleep so have a strong but slow digestive tract.
________________________________________________________________________

The beach:

Mermaids: Usually sizing between 50 and 100 feet tall mermaids prefer to suck water into their massive mouths, while the prey is still in the water, mermaids can breath air and water so you will usually see them basking on the beaches after a long meal. The ones with blue tails tend to be less active, they are the large 100 feet tall mermaids, and green tail mermaids range in size of 75-50 feet tall. They are more active prefering to hunt for prey instead of waiting for it.

Octo girls: Half woman half octopus, these creatures are smart, cunning and quick. They camoflauge from their prey by changing colors and either trap them in their tentacles and eat them through a small whole under their bodies(anally) or through their mouths whole. They usually range in size of 30-40 feet.

Shark girls: Lower body of a shark and upper body of a woman, these fierce hunters cannot breath air so you will not usually see them basking in the sun enjoying thier meals like mermaids. They usually gorge themselves with whatever they can find.
________________________________________________________________________

The plains:

Cat girls: Full woman body, but with cat ears and a tail, their fur color between brown to blonde, cat girls usually hide in tall grass to hunt for prey usually swallowing whole but they sometimes may lightly chew. If they are not hungry they will play with their prey for a little while until their bellies empty themselves and they are hungry again. They are usually between 50-70 feet tall

Giantess: A full woman, just much, Much bigger, they love to eat and swallow smaller creatures whole and are always in the mood for pre-swallow games. They usually are in groups of 3 or 4 other giantesses. They usually also fight between each other for who gets the food first. Usually ranging at the same size as cat girls
_______________________________________________________________________

The mountains:

Hawk Girls: The bodies of humans with two large grey or yellow feathered wings on their backs, depending on the age. They usually live on small perches on the mountains where they feed their young whatever they find. They tend to find hunting for prey amusing and sometimes pleasureful. They usually capture prey in their hands if they see them, or if they are really hungry they will fly straight down to prey and grab them in their mouths, and swallow whole immediately. If humans where caught dead near a nest with babies the mother bird girl will not hesitate to eat them or feed them to her young.
